articles.content: The FDA action came after White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows on Friday told FDA commissioner Stephen Hahn to be prepared to submit his resignation if the agency did not clear the vaccine by days… [+14385 chars]

articles.title: U.S. sees more than 3300 coronavirus deaths in one day as hospitals struggle - CBS This Morning
articles.description: The FDA's approval of the Pfizer coronavirus vaccine came on the deadliest day in the U.S.' battle against the pandemic. More than 3,300 people died of the v...
